body.p: The Project Settings page displays information about the project configuration.
You can edit the Account credentials used to connect to the Git repository, while all the other settings (project name, description, project URL, branch) are read-only and cannot be updated.
You can use the Delete project button to delete the current project.

section.title: Linked Git Repository
section.p: The linked Git repository of a project is used to store the content on all project branches. Content that is part of a review task or a personal workspace is stored internally in and not available in the linked Git repository.
If the project is imported from a Git repository, that repository is automatically linked.
